name: 楊士萱
objective:
線性代數為科學與工程的基礎數學工具，本課程教授線性代數的基本概念與運算技巧。課程大綱如下：
1.線性聯立方程組 
2.矩陣 
3.向量空間 
4.特徵值及特徵向量
5.正交性與最小平方
schedule:
1. Systems of Linear Equations and Matrices 
��	To understand the basic terminologies and notations of matrices and systems of linear equations.
��	Solving a system of linear equations with elementary row operations.
��	Matrix algebra: addition, subtraction, scalar multiple, matrix multiplication power, transpose, and inverse.
��	Determinants.
2. Linear Combinations and Linear Independence 
��	Vector algebra.
��	Linear combinations.
��	Linear independence. 
3. Vector Spaces 
��	Definition of a vector space. 
��	Basis, dimension, and coordinates.
4. Linear Transformations
��	Definition of a linear transformation.
��	Range (column space) and null space.
��	Matrix representation of a linear transformation.
5. Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
��	Definition of Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors.
��	To compute the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a matrix. 
��	Diagonalization of a matrix.
6. Inner-Product Spaces 
��	To introduce inner product of vectors, and thus the geometric concepts of length, distance, and angle (perpendicularity).
��	Orthogonal bases.
��	Inner product spaces and orthogonal complements.
��	Least-Squares approximation.
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance and in-class recitations, 8% (extra).
2. Written exercises, 15%. Hand in your homework every Wednesday right before class. Please do not plagiarize others’ work.
3. Programming assignments, 8%.
4. Scilab projects, 7%.
5. Two 50-minute quizzes, 15% each. 
6. Midterm exam and final exam, 20% each.
materials:
Textbook: 
Introduction to Linear Algebra with Applications by J. Defranza and D. Gagliardi, McGraw- Hill, 2009. （東華書局代理）

Good References :
1. Linear Algebra and Its Applications by David C. Lay. 
2. Elementary Linear Algebra by Howard Anton. 
3. Linear Algebra and Its Applications by Gilbert Strang.
